item.title: Trend Research has today transferred one-third of the total supply of NEIROETH to the exchange.
item.description: September 4th. Based on the monitoring of on-chain analyst Yu Jin, Trend Research has transferred one-third of the total amount of NEIROETH to a trading platform today.In addition to continuously transferring NEIROETH to Bybit, they have also begun to transfer NEIROETH to Gate. Today, they have transferred almost half of their holdings to the trading platform: they originally held a total of 670 million tokens (67% of the total supply), and today they have transferred 324.7 million NEIROETH to the trading platform (with a value of 22 million USD).The on-chain address still holds 34.6% of NEIROETH (346 million tokens, with a value of 23.16 million USD).

item.title: Mega Matrix Submits $2 Billion Registration Statement, Accelerating Stablecoin Governance Token Reserve Strategy
item.description: On September 4th, the New York Stock Exchange-listed company Mega Matrix Inc. (NYSE American: MPU) announced today that it has submitted a $20 billion universal shelf registration statement (Form F-3, referred to as "shelf registration" hereinafter) to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This is to support its Stablecoin Governance Token (DAT) strategy and it is committed to building the world's largest Stablecoin Governance Token DAT company. Following the announcement last week that the Ethena Governance Token ENA would be the primary target of MPU's Stablecoin Governance Token DAT strategy, MPU plans to use this financing flexibility to systematically raise funds to accumulate leading Stablecoin Governance Tokens.

item.title: Fireblocks Launches Stablecoin Payment Network
item.description: On September 4th, as reported by Fortune, Fireblocks has made an announcement regarding the launch of a stablecoin payment network named the "Fireblocks Network for Payments." This network is capable of facilitating the seamless transfer of various stablecoins for both cryptocurrency and financial institutions. Currently, the network has more than 40 participants, such as Bridge (which was acquired by Stripe), Zerohash, Yellow Card, and Circle (which went public in June). In July, Fireblocks processed $212 billion worth of stablecoin transactions. The new network is designed to simplify cross-border stablecoin exchange and transfer processes, enhance efficiency, and decrease error risks.

item.title: Bitfinex Alpha: Market in Late-Cycle Correction, $93K to $95K Range May Become Bitcoin's Cyclical Bottom
item.description: On September 4th, Bitfinex Alpha issued a report indicating that Bitcoin briefly dropped beneath $110,000, and its retracement from the all-time high of $123,640 expanded to more than 13%. Historical retracement patterns and seasonal trends suggest that the market is actually in the later stage of a correction, and the $93,000â€“$95,000 range is expected to become a cyclical bottom. On-chain data also validates this: the current short-term holder realized price is $108,900, which becomes a key support level. If the price continues to remain below this level, it may further enhance the downward pressure. The exchange platform order flow indicator also shows that the sentiment in the spot market is trending towards neutral, reinforcing the view that buyers are choosing to wait and see for stronger catalytic factors to emerge before taking action.Altcoins have exhibited even weaker performance, reflecting a widespread risk-averse sentiment in the market. item.title: RedStone Acquires On-Chain Credit Rating Platform Credora
item.description: September 4th. According to CoinDesk, the cryptocurrency oracle company RedStone has obtained the on-chain credit rating platform Credora. Credora had formerly collaborated with DeFi platforms like Maple Finance, Centrifuge, and TrueFi and is supported by companies including Coinbase Ventures, S&P, and Hashkey. The specific financial details of this transaction have not been made public.

item.title: Initial Jobless Claims Rise to Highest Level Since June
item.description: September 4th: The initial jobless claims in the United States reached the highest level since June, which further attests to the cooling of the labor market. The data indicates that during the week ending August 30th, the initial jobless claims rose by 8,000 and reached 237,000. The median forecast from institutions was 230,000. Meanwhile, the continued jobless claims remained unchanged at 1.94 million. (FXStreet)

item.title: Nasdaq-listed company CIMG Inc. teams up with Merlin Chain to launch a $55 million Bitcoin treasury
item.description: On September 4th, the Nasdaq-listed company CIMG Inc. (Nasdaq: IMG) announced a strategic partnership with Merlin Chain. As a result, a $55 million Bitcoin treasury is to be launched. The initial 500 BTC will be placed on-chain through Merlin Chain's Institutional HODL+ and will participate in staking. This event marks the industry's first pilot of an on-chain Bitcoin treasury driven by a publicly listed company. It not only highlights the accelerated financialization of Bitcoin but also provides a compliant, secure, and sustainable BTCfi path for corporate treasuries.

item.title: GameSquare: Held 15,731.07 ETH as of the end of August
item.description: September 4th: The Nasdaq-listed company GameSquare issued its monthly performance report, revealing that it held 15,731.07 ETH as of August 31st, and the value was approximately $69,089,444. GameSquare stated that its ETH holdings and earnings data did not include other on-chain assets, such as the company's NFT investment portfolio, which had a cost basis of approximately $7.15 million by the end of August.

item.title: Eric Trump: American Bitcoin Set to Make Several Major Announcements
item.description: On September 4th, Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, tweeted, stating, "American Bitcoin is merely commencing, and several significant announcements will be forthcoming shortly."

item.title: Initial Claims for Unemployment Insurance in the US totaled 237,000 for the week ending August 30, compared to an expectation of 230,000.
item.description: On September 4th, the initial jobless claims in the United States during the week ending August 30th came in at 237,000. The expected value was 230,000, and the previous value was 229,000. (FX168)
